rooms.description: A beautiful courtyard with flowers on both sides of the stone walkway. \nThe walkway leads north. A billboard is in the distance.

Entrance to an old, musty-smelling mansion. Some people have entered, to never return. \nThe door to the north is open. The courtyard is to your south and a foyer to your north. A chandelier hangs from the ceiling.

The foyer of the mansion. A staircase leads upstairs but it is dilapidated and unusable. Therefore, the only exits to the south and east. \nA strange breeze moves through the room. Eastward is a small room that looks like a library. A teddy bear lies on the floor with its hair shaved
You walked into this eerie library FROM the west. Another room is north. \nBooks now on the floor revealing a secret passage to the East!
You've found a hidden chamber! It's a small room that's barely the size of a closet. \nThere's an old desk here. It looks like no one has sat at it in a LONG time.

This is a spotless kitchen. Pots and pans are hanging from the ceiling. A stove is here. Stainless steel appliances are everywhere. \nOut of the corner of your eye, you think you see something moving to your west.
A large dining room with a Mahogany wood table. \nA cute furry rabbit is on the table eating carrots.
Uh oh. You're on a giant plate, full of carrots! \nI think we need to go, NOW!

This a living room. The dining area is to your south and another room to your east. \nThe laptop is now making all kinds of noise. A file on a thumb drive has opened automatically and describes a recursive algorithm.
A study/office room. A fake mirror has been shattered showing an opening to the east.

Align Headquarters. Professor Keith is here working on your architecture review requirements.\n \"Great to see you!\" he says. \"Looks like you're ready to do your code walk!\" \nThere is an open pathway to the north.

items.name: Hair Clippers
items.when_used: You activate the clippers. It makes a loud buzzing sound as you use them!
items.description: Cordless Wahl hair clippers for pets or humans. The battery low light is blinking.

items.name: Thumb Drive
items.description: A USB thumb drive for computers

items.name: Lamp
items.when_used: You light the lamp with the flint.
items.description: An old oil lamp with flint to spark.

items.name: Key
items.when_used: You insert the key and turn it. 'Click!'
items.description: A medium-sized key. Looks like it may unlock a cabinet or desk.

items.name: Algorithms Book
items.when_used: You read the Algo Book and make note of computational theories.
items.description: A book on computer algorithms, signed by Professor Keith. \nThe inscription reads: \"You'll need this in CS5800. Best wishes to you, Aligner!\n P.S.: Don't forget: a recursive solution needs a base case!

items.name: Frying Pan
items.description: A stainless steel skillet for frying.

items.name: Carrot
items.when_used: You take a small bite the carrot and then share it.
items.description: A carrot. But not just any carrot, but a HUGE carrot! Bigger than you've seen before.

items.name: Golden Ticket
items.when_used: You read the Golden Ticket and mark your calendar. 'We cannot miss our code review!', you happily shout as you place it in the slot.
items.description: A Golden Ticket inviting your team to the Architectural Review and Code Walk with our TA Team.

fixtures.name: Billboard
fixtures.description: A large billboard looms in the distance. \nIt's hard to read but seems to say 'Welcome to Align Quest, adventurer! Enjoy the exploration! - Prof. K'

fixtures.name: Chandelier
fixtures.description: A large and heavy chandelier hangs from the ceiling. \nThe light from it is dim, and it is too high to reach without using a mechanical lift.

fixtures.name: Bookshelf
fixtures.description: A tall black oak bookshelf in the corner of the room. \nIt's much too heavy to move...but there's something weird about it and the books seem to tremble on their own

fixtures.name: Desk
fixtures.description: An old wooden desk with a mess of papers. A note says: \"use thumb drive!\"

fixtures.name: Stove
fixtures.description: A large propane stove. You like electric ones, but this wasn't your decision, obviously.

fixtures.name: Laptop
fixtures.description: A ZacPro 5000 with all the latest features and a USB slot. It's bolted to the table and can't move

fixtures.name: Professor Keith
fixtures.description: Professor Keith, Faculty Director of Align Boston. He smiles at you and gives a thumb's up. \"Great job! You can do this!\"

monsters.name: Teddy Bear
monsters.description: A peaceful, cute-looking teddy bear with its hair clipped sits on the floor
monsters.effects: A monster Teddy Bear growls at you! You cannot get past!
monsters.attack: hits you with soft, fluffy paws! You might sneeze!

monsters.name: Rabbit
monsters.description: Awww. A furry rabbit twitching its nose and eating a carrot. Makes you want to pet him
monsters.effects: A monster Rabbit moves towards you! He's blocking the way north. \nI think you might be dinner!
monsters.attack: licks you with a giant tongue!

puzzles.name: MOD-SPOOKY-VOICE
puzzles.description: An spooky, eerie library. You walked into this eerie library FROM the west. \nAnother room is north. Books are rustling by themselves on a bookshelf.
puzzles.effects: Books are rustling by themselves on the bookshelf. That's a weird bookshelf. Really weird.\nYou hear a voice whisper: \"~Find Even Numbers Only~\" \nYikes. That's creepy. Maybe we should leave?

puzzles.name: USB
puzzles.description: A laptop with a USB port
puzzles.effects: This is a quiet living room. \nThe dining area is to your south and another room to your east but there seems to be an invisible barrier blocking you from going in that direction. \nA dimly lit laptop is on a small table in the corner

puzzles.name: RECURSION-PUZZLE
puzzles.description: I feel like we've been here before - not quite an infinite loop but infinite...!
puzzles.effects: Every time you move, you end up in the same room!\nSomething is etched into the wall with a knife. It says: 'Provide a solution to end the recursive madness'
